original_title: Cometa: Él, su perro y su mundo
overview: Roberto Martínez (Armando Álvarez) loses his job, his home and his family; He has to spend a few nights on the street in what a reaction plan does. One of those days he meets a hairy friend with whom he will live new adventures until both recover everything they have lost.
title: Comet: Him, His Dog and His World
